title: Komplexní mluvní terapie
description: Specialized care for children from infancy through adolescence, addressing articulation, language development, and communication disorders.

title: Dechová a koncentrační cvičení
description: Comprehensive support for adults recovering from stroke, brain injury, or other conditions affecting speech and language abilities.

title: Práce s energetickými systémy člověka
description: Professional guidance for singers, speakers, and individuals with voice disorders to improve vocal health and performance.

title: Grafologie
description: Evidence-based treatment for stuttering and other fluency disorders, helping clients communicate with confidence.

title: Australské květové esence
description: Professional guidance for singers, speakers, and individuals with voice disorders to improve vocal health and performance.

title: Online terapie přes MS Teams
description: Na domluvu je možné sjednat online terapii přes videohovor
